full_summary:
# Tenders - Department of Public Works and Government Services

## Harbour Revitalization - Newport - Gaspesia Region

**Activity Code:** F3731-230048
**Request for Proposal:** [Closed]

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* **Address:** 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0E6, Canada

### Tender Status
* **Status:** Expired
* **Publication Date:** August 24, 2023
* **Closing Date:** September 21, 2023, at 14:00 (EST)

### Opportunity Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites you to submit a proposal for the Harbour Revitalization - Newport - Gaspesia Region project. This project involves providing marine construction services, as per the citation 72141200.

### Key Information

* **Classification:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Procurement Method:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions Delivering the Goods:** Quebec, Canada

### Evaluation Criteria
Proposal submissions will be evaluated based on price.

### Important

* **No attachments are provided** with this notification. You are encouraged to review the documentation via the Ariba system link attached below.
* **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17258227?extsite=MTcyNTgyMjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17258227?extsite=MTcyNTgyMjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contact Information

For more information regarding this tender, please feel free to contact Maude Roy-Lippe, PSPC at [maude.roy-lippe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:maude.roy-lippe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
